name: Jinyoung Han
content: Jinyoung HanSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationJinyoung Han, Ph.D.Sungkyunkwan University90311 International Hall, 25-2 Sungkyunkwan-ro Jongno-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 03063E-mail: jinyounghan AT skku DOT eduBioJinyoung Han is (Tenured) Associate Professor in the Department of Applied Artificial Intelligence at Sungkyunkwan University (SKKU), where he leads the Data Science and Artificial Intelligence Lab (DSAIL). Before joining SKKU, he was Assistant Professor at Hanyang University (ERICA). He was a postdoctoral researcher at University of California, Davis, and Seoul National University. He received his Ph.D. in computer science and engineering from Seoul National University in 2013, and B.S. degree in computer science from KAIST in 2007. His research interests generally lie in data mining, network science, machine learning, social computing, and Internet.03/2023 -                      Associate Professor at Sungkyunkwan UniversityHead of Department of Applied Artificial Intelligence (2020-2021, 2023-current)09/2019 - 02/2023 Assistant Professor at Sungkyunkwan University03/2017 - 08/2019 Assistant Professor at Hanyang University
